mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, b. * from (select board_no as boardNo, board_name as boardName, board_writer as boardWriter, board_date as boardDate from board_tbl order by 1 desc)b) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into board_tbl values( board_seq.nextval, 'test', #{boardName}, #{categoryNo}, #{boardContent}, #{boardPrice}, to_char(sysdate,'yyy-mm-dd'), #{accountWriter}, #{accountName}, #{accountBank}, to_date(#{boardStart},'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(#{boardEnd},'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{referenceLink}, to_date(#{deliveryDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{boardEtc}, 0, 1, 'dora' )

insert into file_tbl values(file_seq.nextval, #{boardNo}, #{filepath})
select max(board_no) from board_tbl
mapper.select: select file_no as fileNo, board_no as boardNo, filepath from file_tbl where board_no = #{_parameter}
